data.meta_description: Top Medical Universities of Russia under 20 lacs tuition fees, Best Medical Universities in Russia for Mbbs. Kazan Federal, Siberian State Medical University Etc.
data.text:
Duration of Studying in Best MBBS Universities of Russia

All the Best Medical Universities in Russia which International students choose to do their MBBS from Russia, offers the course for the Duration of 6 Years if they Choose to Study in a Full English or Bilingual program, except one University (i.e. I.P Pavlov State Medical University St. Petersburg.) If as student choses to do their MBBS in Russia in Russian Language then they have to join extra one year of preparatory course, which makes the Duration of MBBS in Russia 7 Years.

Eligibility Criteria for Best Universities in Russia.

As per Medical Council of India the minimum qualification for Indian Students to study abroad is: 1. 50% in physics, chemistry and biology in 12th standard. In case of SC/ST/OBC it is 40%.

2. Should qualify the NEET exam by getting at least 50 percentiles. (It should be around 153 marks out of 720 in 2019)

3. The minimum age should be 17 years.

4. All the Medical Universities in Russia are regulated by same Government Body and are recognized by MCI (Medical Council of India), NMC(National Medical Council), WHO & Medical Council of leading countries like U.S.A, U.K, middle east, Australia, India, Canada etc. so it does not matter which government university you choose for MBBS in Russia.

Best university for anyone is the one which is most suitable for oneself keeping in Mind the location, fees, Monthly expense, and oneâ€™s personal needs.

The list down below is Best suited for Indian students who want to fulfill their dreams of becoming a doctor by Studying MBBS in Russia. As we are students studying MBBS in Russia itself we have kept in mind all the needs of the students and have come up with this list.

Note- All these Universities teach students fully in English Language.

Kazan State University

With 200 years of experience in medical training, KSMU is justifiably an international University. Around 700 students from more than 57 countries around the world study here and half of them study in English. Moreover, we have a large group of students from neighboring and remote regions of Russia. We are proud that Kazan medical school is attractive for young people from different parts of the world. That is why our priority is support and care for international students.......
